title: Sonic Frontiers Preview Round-Up - Kinda Funny Games Daily 10.24.22
description:
Watch The Rings of Power on Prime Video and download the Amazon Music app to listen to all eight episodes of The Official The Lord of the Rings: The Rings of Power Podcast for free on Amazon Music.

Go to http://policygenius.com to get your free life insurance quotes and see how much you could save.

Does the Blue Blur's latest round of previews impress or stress? Greg and Tim find out!

Time Stamps:
00:00:00 - Start
00:03:01 - Housekeeping
Black Adam In Review is live!
It’s the final week for Patreon fundraising! Help us crush everything on kindafunny.com/goals by subbing on patreon.com/kindafunny!
The Roper Report   -
00:06:57 - Sonic Frontiers Preview Round-Up
00:17:29 - God of War Spoilers are out there!
00:23:48 - Poor Launch for Uncharted PC
00:28:42 - Steam Success
00:37:18 - Discord Coming to PS5
00:42:23 - Fallout 4 coming to PS5, Xbox Series
00:45:49 - BLACK ADAM SPOILERS/DCEU Update
00:50:30 - Out today
00:51:30 - You‘re Wrong
Tomorrow’s Hosts: Bless & Tim
